definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Bruno and I were friends when we were boys.
sentences.chinese: 当我们还是小毛头的时候，我和布鲁诺就是好朋友了。

sentences.english: The little one could stand it no longer. His nose twitching, he burst out crying.
sentences.chinese: 小毛头招架不住了，鼻子一抽，哇地一声哭起来。

sentences.english: Their five-year-old little darling intervened, trying to be the peace-maker.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的小毛头站在中间欲做“和事佬”。

definition: smell of mother's milk not yet dried (idiom); immature and inexperienced/still wet behind the ears
smell of mother's milk not yet dried (idiom); immature and inexperienced/still wet behind the ears
newly hatched bird/fig. inexperienced person/fig. chick (slighting term for young woman)/bimbo
little demon (term of endearment for a child)/mischievous child/imp
